channel.title: The passwords are messed up
channel.description:
When I try to look at a password of an account, it shows it in a weird way, how would I fix that?
Ex. of a bit of a cahr file
[code][ACCOUNT] character-username = PassDunWork character-password = 170-71-248-33-92-111-48-160-220-219-42-54-169-244-22-142[/code]
I know in other sources it would actually show the pass. The ::getpass command shows the same thing, just numbers with dashes...

item.title: The passwords are messed up

item.description:
@vato wrote:

read what he said.it worked.stfu.

Read full topic

item.title: The passwords are messed up
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Spyker8:

[quote]lol key logger? it does that so you can’t hack you noob?

Frick I HATE people like you, try to act all cool by calling people ‘noob’, who calls people noob anyways… Im JUST learning how to code in java, I’m sure you’ve been like that before, dunno what your doing cause your LEARNING, if your not gonna help or be nice you might as well gtfo -_-

[quote]//String hashPW = md5(playerPass);
//playerPass = hashPW;[/quote]

I’m guessing I add that to a java file? (client.java?)[/quote]If you can’t even understand that //String hashPW = md5(playerPass);
//playerPass = hashPW; wouldn’t do shit if you added it, you shouldn’t even have a server. It’s a comment! It’s already in your client.java, delete the //'s[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 27, 2008, 11:25:31 AM[/size][hr][quote=“Spyker8, post:5, topic:193245”][quote]lol key logger? it does that so you can’t hack you noob?[/quote]

Frick I HATE people like you, try to act all cool by calling people ‘noob’, who calls people noob anyways… Im JUST learning how to code in java, I’m sure you’ve been like that before, dunno what your doing cause your LEARNING, if your not gonna help or be nice you might as well gtfo -_-

[quote]//String hashPW = md5(playerPass);
//playerPass = hashPW;[/quote]

I’m guessing I add that to a java file? (client.java?)[/quote]If you really want to learn Java, try actual tutorials, and not just code a Mopar server. -.- That doesn’t teach you anything useful if you really want to code.

Read full topic

no lol.
cntrl+F String hashPW = md5(playerPass);
then add the “//” before ea one of those
